# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

# Project name
project(relearn)

# This setting is useful for providing JSON file used by CodeLite for code completion
set(CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS 1)

set(CONFIGURATION_NAME "Debug")

set(CL_WORKSPACE_DIRECTORY ..)
# Set default locations
set(CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/${CL_WORKSPACE_DIRECTORY}/cmake-build-${CONFIGURATION_NAME}/output)
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${CL_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})

# Projects


# Top project
## Add the dependencies
add_subdirectory(${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../relearn_dl ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/relearn_dl-build)
add_subdirectory(${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../relearn_sl ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/relearn_sl-build)
# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_relearn_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}")
set(WORKSPACE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/..")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
#}}}}

include_directories(
    .
    .
    ../relearn/include/
    ../relearn_dl/include/
    ../relearn_sl/include/

)


# Compiler options
add_definitions(-Wmain)
add_definitions(-pedantic-errors)
add_definitions(-g)
add_definitions(-O0)
add_definitions(-pedantic)
add_definitions(-W)
add_definitions(-fopenmp)
add_definitions(-std=c++17)
add_definitions(-Wall)

# Linker options
set(LINK_OPTIONS -O0)


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
link_directories(
    .
    ${WORKSPACE_PATH}/cmake-build-${CONFIGURATION_NAME}/output/
)

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src/main.cpp
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -Wmain -pedantic-errors -g -O0 -pedantic -W -fopenmp -std=c++17 -Wall")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_executable(relearn ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(relearn ${LINK_OPTIONS})

target_link_libraries(relearn
    librelearn_dl.so
    librelearn_sl.a
)


# Adding dependencies
add_dependencies(relearn relearn_dl)
add_dependencies(relearn relearn_sl)


#{{{{ User Code 3
# Place your code here
#}}}}
